page.shortlink: grid component client side websocketonmessage event
page.description: Fires when a web socket server message is received.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: message
property.description: A JSON object that contains the message from the server. Includes information about the message type, text, etc.

section.title: How to Determine the Values Available in e.message
section.description: To see all properties available in the *[js:e.message]* object, use *[js:JSON.stringify]*. For example:
